description:
It's a short portage but definitely worth it.  Once your on Lac Vert, you can explore many different lakes by short portages.  The pictures speak for themselves.  


  [advertisement]
This is a perfect area for taking along a super light packraft from 
Alpacka Raft.
Packrafts get you to some wild places, and portages are a pleasure with these lightweight watercrafts.
directions:
Directions

From Macdonald Cartier bridge to portage parking is 101 km. Take Hwy 5 to the end, turn right to Hwy 105. Turn left to Kazabazua for 33 minutes, or 38.1 km then turn right to Mont Ste-Marie. From here follow downloaded track.
title: Lac Vert Mont Ste-Marie
